text:
When I try to start jmeter, it keep throw the error below. It looks like that 
the applet can not start due to null property. The error is below. 

C:\jakarta-jmeter-20030415\bin>jmeter
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.apache.jmeter.testelement.property.AbstractProperty.getBooleanVa
ue(AbstractProperty.java:254)
        at org.apache.jmeter.testelement.property.BooleanProperty.getBooleanVal
e(BooleanProperty.java:67)
        at org.apache.jmeter.testelement.AbstractTestElement.getPropertyAsBoole
n(AbstractTestElement.java:178)
        at org.apache.jmeter.gui.tree.JMeterTreeNode.isEnabled(JMeterTreeNode.j
va:98)
        at org.apache.jmeter.gui.tree.JMeterCellRenderer.getTreeCellRendererCom
onent(JMeterCellRenderer.java:90)
        at javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicTreeUI$NodeDimensionsHandler.getNodeDime
sions(Unknown Source)
        at javax.swing.tree.AbstractLayoutCache.getNodeDimensions(Unknown Sourc
)
        at javax.swing.tree.VariableHeightLayoutCache$TreeStateNode.updatePrefe
redSize(Unknown Source)
        at javax.swing.tree.VariableHeightLayoutCache.updateNodeSizes(Unknown S
urce)
        at javax.swing.tree.VariableHeightLayoutCache.invalidateSizes(Unknown S
urce)
        at javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicTreeUI.setCellRenderer(Unknown Source)
        at javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicTreeUI$PropertyChangeHandler.propertyCha
ge(Unknown Source)
        at javax.swing.event.SwingPropertyChangeSupport.firePropertyChange(Unkn
wn Source)
        at javax.swing.JComponent.firePropertyChange(Unknown Source)
        at javax.swing.JTree.setCellRenderer(Unknown Source)
        at org.apache.jmeter.gui.MainFrame.makeTree(MainFrame.java:432)
        at org.apache.jmeter.gui.MainFrame.createTreePanel(MainFrame.java:407)
        at org.apache.jmeter.gui.MainFrame.init(MainFrame.java:351)
        at org.apache.jmeter.gui.MainFrame.<init>(MainFrame.java:150)
        at org.apache.jmeter.JMeter.startGui(JMeter.java:201)
        at org.apache.jmeter.JMeter.start(JMeter.java:251)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
        at org.apache.jmeter.NewDriver.main(NewDriver.java:165)
An error occurred: null
